unitycatalog.schemas.v1.SchemaInfo.schem.description: A schema is a namespace within a catalog that contains tables.

created_at.description: Time at which this schema was created, in epoch milliseconds.

full_name.description: Full name of schema, in form of catalog_name.schema_name.

name.description: Name of schema, relative to parent catalog.

owner.description: Username of current owner of schema.

properties.description: A map of key-value properties attached to the securable.

updated_at.description: Time at which this schema was last updated, in epoch milliseconds.

updated_by.description: Username of user who last modified schema.

unitycatalog.schemas.v1.SchemaInfo.schem.title: Schema Info
